greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the smallest value >= 0 of the form x^3 - n^2.
comment: a(n) = 0 if n is a cube (i.e., n is in A000578(k)).
a(n) = A181138(n) if n is not a cube. - _Zak Seidov_, Mar 26 2013
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, May 20 2002
